content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question for the Evaluator] The response should be "Yes".
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question for the Evaluator] The final price agreed upon was 550 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question for the Evaluator] As the landlord, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 7. I found Yi-Nuo Wang to be respectful and reasonable, but we had some differing opinions on the rental price. 

[Response for the Evaluator] Confirmed.
name: Peter Schmidt
